bwwExcerpt: After an evening of hurt, heart and hilarity, the moving climax is a slideshow of images of Sondheim, who died in 2021, next to his old friends as the cast wails gorgeous arrangements of “Not a Day Goes By” and “Being Alive.” Sondheim and a fantastic company of actors, standing side by side by side.
